meta.title: About the Guild - Cybersecurity Guild of Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics
meta.description: Founded in 2016, the Cybersecurity Guild of Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics is dedicated to popularizing cybersecurity knowledge and cultivating technical talent. It includes a Technical Department, Organization Department, and Publicity Department, and has an elite security team (WPST). We organize competitions and exchange activities and welcome interested students to join.

intro.title: Guild Overview
intro.p1: {0} was founded in September 2016. Its mission is to popularize cybersecurity knowledge among students and staff, cultivate cybersecurity technical talent, promote mutual exchange, and grow together.
intro.p2: The guild was created so we could {highlighted}. We organize everyone to participate in competitions, and promote and run activities to deepen students’ interest in cybersecurity. At the same time, as a technical discussion platform, we provide a community for students who are interested and capable to communicate and improve.
intro.highlightedText: learn and exchange cybersecurity knowledge together, and teach students about cybersecurity
intro.wpstIntro: Meanwhile, our guild also has an elite security team — the Weak Password Security Team (WPST). The team has long focused on cybersecurity and accumulated rich experience in vulnerability discovery, offense and defense, and security strategy.

study.name: Learning Department
study.desc: Responsible for technical research, training, and competition guidance

organization.name: Organization Department
organization.desc: Responsible for event planning and coordination

publicity.name: Publicity Department
publicity.desc: Responsible for guild branding and content production

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.qrLabel: QR Code for the 2025 JXUFE Cybersecurity Guild Recruitment Group
joinUs.scan_qr: Whether you are a JXUFE student or not, you can scan the QR code at {0} to join the 2025 JXUFE Cybersecurity Guild recruitment group and interact with us.
joinUs.idolLine: Let’s become the school’s idols together!

contributors.para: The successful launch of this website is all thanks to the contributions of the following folks. A huge thank you for their hard work! We welcome you to join us and build the Cybersecurity Guild of JXUFE website together. If you'd like to learn more or get involved in this project, just click {0}!
